claw.tatsu.xcodeml.abstraction

Class HoistedNestedDoStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.xcodeml.abstraction.NestedDoStatement
      • claw.tatsu.xcodeml.abstraction.HoistedNestedDoStatement

  • public class HoistedNestedDoStatement
extends NestedDoStatement
    Class holding information about a group of nested loop in a do statement hoisting transformation.
    Author:
    clementval

        Check whether this group of do statements needs the extraction from na IF statement.
